transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello, good morning ma'am.
Customer: Ji, good morning.
Executive: Anshika baat kar rahi hu main IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji Anshika ji bataiye.
Executive: Haan ji ma'am, abhi aap bataiye ki abhi uske baad aapne koi buylead consume ki?
Customer: Maine kal jo maine apne shortlist kar rakhi thi na, wo 10 buylead maine use kari. 
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Ek bhi kaam ki nahi thi. Jo typing work ke liye tha, jaise humne type mera typing work rehta hai, maine typing work wali ki hui thi teen char. Wo sab candidates the. Unko actually job chahiye. To to nahi kar rahe hain, unko job chahiye. Jo companies thi wo sabhi waise hi nikle. Aur do company unko humne kabhi requirement hi nahi kari.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Ma'am unko unhone bola unko job chahiye aur aap ki jo catalog hain wo ye hain ki aap job provide karte ho. Sorry, nahi madam, hume aisi companies chahiye. Sabse sabse ke liye service thi. Unko class ke hisab se candidate chahiye. Haa jinke pass vacancy ho. Mujhe aisi companies chahiye thi jinke pass vacancy ho. Jinhe apni open vacancy ke liye candidate chahiye ho. To main unko candidate provide kar saku. Candidate provide kar saku. Okay. Ji haan mera kaam candidate provide karne ka hai.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai. To ma'am dekhiye main aapko yaha pe clear bata deti hu ki hamara kaam hai aapko buyer ki details dena jo candidate hai jis tarah ki aapka catalog bana hua hai sirf wo dena. Aage baat jab aap karoge.
Customer: Madam meri baat suno. Na na na na na na na. Ye ho raha hai fraud ka kaam aapki taraf se. Meri baat suniye meri baat kisi Rakesh se hui hai aur kisi Deepak ji se hui hai. Unko bahut clear bataya tha maine ki mera meri agency hai, companies ka data chahiye. Candidates ka data nahi chahiye. Unhone mujhse yahi kaha ki madam aapko companies ka hi data milega. Unhone mujhse bakayda pucha ki kya aap typing service provide karte hain? Ji haan main typing karwa ke deti hu. Unhone kaha hamare pass aisi companies hai jo typing karwayenge aapse. Theek hai? Clear bola gaya hai ye cheeze mujhe.
Executive: Wo aapki baat theek hai ki aapko bola gaya ki ye ye aapko provided hoga. Main bol rahi hu ki jaise aapne bola na ki 10 buylead aapne consume kiye hain unme se ek bhi nahi mili. To ho sakta hai ek bhi nahi nikle. Kyunki humne unse baat nahi ki buyer se wo buylead jo aati hai wo approve ho ke aati hai. Yaha se buyer se baat karke nahi aati hai wo aapke candidate hain unse baat karke nahi aayegi. Wo sirf approve ho ke aayegi. Baat aapko karni hogi unse. Aur agar ye jo aapne aapka jo catalog hai jisme non IT staff providing services. Haan. Theek hai staff providing staff. Nahi staff hi bola hai non IT staff providing services. Ye likha hua hai na aapke catalog mein staff provider services. Haan. Theek hai. Aap ek minute hold pe kijiye.

Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan. Ma'am actually is bare mein na jaise aap bol rahe ho ki yaha pe buylead aapko is tarah ki mil rahi hai aur aapko chahiye us tarah ki. To kya aap mujhe bata sakte ho ki buylead aapko matlab jo buylead aapne consume ki thi ek do to usme kya likha tha?
Customer: 10 buylead consume ki hai maine maine ek do nahi kari.
Executive: Theek hai. Nahi aapke yaha se jo haan.
Customer: Aapke yaha se jo hai matlab haan. Ji ji jo aapke yaha pe jo agent the unhone bataya ki mujhe kaise search karna hai. Unhone bataya ki aapko jo yaha pe buyer likha hota hai waha pe aapko click karna hai. Uske baad aap daloge recruitment daloge aap placement word daloge. To usse related aapko jo hai jo bhi requirement hamare pass hogi aapko mil jaya karegi. Maine unse pucha ki mujhe aisa kaise pata chalega ki inko kya requirement hai? Kaunsa candidate inko chahiye? Kehne lage madam wo aapko jab phone karenge tab wo batayenge. Unhone hume aise bola. Haan. Fir maine kaha ki jaise mera typing ka bhi work rehta hai. Main typing karwa ke deti hu bacho se. To bole ki haan hamare pass na aisi companies bhi bahut hai jo jinko ki typing ka work chahiye hota hai. To aap usme typing search karo to aapko aisi companies mil jayengi jinko typing work karwana hai. Maine wo dala ke search kiya. Unke aage unhone kaha ki aapko jo usme shortlist kar lo. Maine usme shortlist kiya unke kehne par hi. Uske baad jab mere ko active hua tab maine unko call kari hai. Mujhe kya impression hai mujhe kya bataya gaya hai ki ye sab companies hai jinko ki work chahiye jinko ki candidate chahiye. Ye aage se mujhe bataya gaya isliye mujhe shortlist karwaya gaya. Ab jab maine unko call kari to pata chala ki wo koi company hai hi nahi. Wo to individuals hai. Haan. Maine bakayda unse pucha bhi ki company ka naam kaha hai? Kehne lage company ka naam hai na wo tum aapko na baad mein pata chalega. Ye keh kar mujhe totally mujhe aisa lag raha hai ki just unka main maksad tha mere pass se paisa nikal jaye. To aapke na to waha pe companies ka naam tha na kuch aur tha ab wo mujhe keh rahe baad mein sab pata chalega. Ab wo baad ab tak to aayi nahi hai. Maine call kari wo sab individuals hai. Hmm hmm. To agar mujhe buylead hi chahiye hoti to maine Justdial ka already le rakha hai. Justdial ki service hai mere pass. Wo saaf clear kehte hai ki bhai usko job seekers hai na wo call karenge aapko. Ji ma'am. Aapne ma'am ko GST verified wali buylead consume kiye GST verified jisko likha hota hai? Wo mujhe nahi pata mujhe totally nahi pata. Mujhe kaha gaya tha ki aap shortlist kar sakte hain maine wo shortlist kar rakhi thi maine unme se kiya. Theek hai. Ma'am main na ek kaam karti hu main apne manager sir se aapki baat kara deti hu. To ek cheez aur bata du mujhe aage se call bhi aayi hai do ek ya do call aayi hai wo call bhi candidates ki thi. Wo bhi job seekers the wo bhi companies nahi thi. IndiaMART ka itna naam suna tha ki wo B to B ke liye hai fir individuals ke call kyu aa rahe hai bhai? Hmm.
Executive: Haan sir wo ho sakta hai.
Customer: Ji ji. Nahi ma'am B to B ke liye to hai ye sab baat sach hai ki IndiaMART famous hai wo B to B ke liye hai. But wo jaise agar for example waise main aapke manager sir se baat kara dungi aap unse problem apni share kar dena ek baar aur. Lekin agar main waise baat karu retail ki jaise aur bhi businessman yaha pe hote hain aur mere unse consultation hoti hai to unko bhi thoda issue aata hai ki koi koi retail wala hota hai to wo log agar buylead un logo ko retail mein consume karni hoti hai to wo kar lete hain agar retail mein deal karte nahi karni hoti hai to wo chhod dete hain. Theek hai but aapka jo catalog hai wo bahut different hai aapka ek tarah ka candidate provide kara rahe ho unka ek product provide agar dekhiye mera kehne ka matlab hai mujhe bhi samajh mein aata hai aap log jo ek hota hai jo goods sale kar rahe hain main service sale kar rahi hu. Agar aap logo ke pass service sale ke liye kuch data tha hi nahi to mujhse service di kyu gayi hai? Mujhe clear mana kar diya jana tha recruitment service ke liye hamare pass kuch nahi hai. Obvious na? Nahi yaani ki tum sale agent ka uska kaam to sale kar do bas. Ji nahi ma'am thank you ma'am lijiye dekhiye agar matlab aisa hai ki waise main yaha pe dekho dekh rahi hu agar mere pass jo data hai like placement service ke regarding hamare pass 4000 kuch buylead hai aur main aapko ye video mein isko dikha bhi dungi but ek baar aap sir se baat kijiye maybe aapko clear ho wo aapko jyada acche se samjha paye. Theek hai wo aapko samne se ek minute ek minute ek minute madam Anishka ji ek minute clear kar dijiye ji aapko clear kar diya agar 10 mein se ek lead bhi mujhe acchi mil jati na ki haan samne wale ne kaha hota ki haan meri ye company hai but mujhe abhi is cheez ki requirement hai. Mujhe samajh mein aata. Samne wala keh raha hai mujhe mujhe requirement hi nahi hai maine to koi aisi lead hi nahi dali. Ek mujhe kehta hai mujhe to job chahiye. To main us cheez se main kya samjhu? Aapne isme samjhane wali baat kya reh gayi hai? Aap mujhe ab yaha samjha nahi sakte hain aap. Mere pass to do option hai. Pehli cheez to ya to mujhe aisi lead di jaye jo actually mein companies hai jinko ki candidates ki requirement hai. Dusra ye hai ki agar nahi hai aapke pass aisa kaam to mera paisa refund kar diya jaye. Ye do option hai iske alawa to main do do dudh piti bacchi nahi hu main. I clear my own point very clearly. Ma'am main aapki baat samajh gayi but kya hota hai ki agar paise ka bhi problem hota hai agar lagta hai kyunki ye kuch cheeze hai jo tools hote hain wo mere pass hote hain pura AI based hai. Kuch mere manager ke pass hote hain so mere manager ke pass jyada filters hote hain to wo dekh sakte hain. Aapko baat karwaiye meri main abhi office nikal rahi hu. Haan mujhe aap unko bol dijiye main unko 11 baje call kar lenge. Aur agar abhi turant baat karwani hai to karwa dijiye sari ki sari. 12 baje ya abhi? Abhi baat karwa dijiye aap abhi karwa dijiye. Theek hai wo na ma'am apne hi number se call karenge aap pick up kar lijiyega. Theek hai?
Theek hai. Thank you. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Dissatisfied with buyleads; all candidates, not companies.

- Feels misled about the type of leads provided.

- Wants companies needing candidates, not job seekers.

- Requests refund if suitable leads cannot be provided.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the buylead approval process.

- Executive offered to connect with manager for resolution.

- Executive mentioned additional buyleads for placement services.



Next Steps: 

- Manager will call the customer from their number.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, companies, candidates, job seekers
